name: Mitigation Playbook for Rogue Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed a rogue script across multiple hosts to harvest sensitive information.

parallel--d20e7b68-5295-4ced-84f6-62f5cb.name: Execute Mitigation Steps
parallel--d20e7b68-5295-4ced-84f6-62f5cb.description: Execute all mitigation steps simultaneously to address the rogue script execution.

action--a2e29861-d2ab-4c0d-b019-fadd21ce.name: Kill malicious processes
action--a2e29861-d2ab-4c0d-b019-fadd21ce.description: Terminate any rogue scripts that are currently executing.

action--1675b3d9-e511-4b58-b013-0af35bdc.name: Block outbound connection to malicious IPs
action--1675b3d9-e511-4b58-b013-0af35bdc.description: Block any further outbound traffic to known malicious IP address.

action--f5b7ae5f-a509-4362-b095-3851c75f.name: Run antivirus scan on affected hosts
action--f5b7ae5f-a509-4362-b095-3851c75f.description: Perform a comprehensive scan to detect and mitigate any additional malware on all affected hosts.

while-condition--6e0d66ea-4d5e-4c5b-9168.name: Scan until clean
while-condition--6e0d66ea-4d5e-4c5b-9168.description: Continuously run antivirus scan until the system is clean.
